text: Hi Folks,  Hope someone can give me a help right here :sob:,  Just tried to use the modules from the Tickets table and add a priority field but the results is like this. Repeating output "Priority 3" takeover all the other items.

Hi everyone,
It seems I found a bug. If I added “is_available_for_new_content=false” to my custom module I can’t add a section with that module to the page. I wanted to allow users to add new sections, but I don’t want to allow using the module from that section separately.
What i’ve done in the past is just create a ‘template partial’ .html file, with all the svg code, then import that into my module, it’s not as nice as uploading an SVG file but it works
